passes.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
passes.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

passes.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
passes.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

passes.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
passes.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

passes.description: Ensures aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body.
passes.help: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

passes.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
passes.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

passes.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
passes.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

passes.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
passes.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

passes.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
passes.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

passes.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
passes.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

nodes.html: <div data-scope="" ms-slider="" id="2" class="ms_wrapper ng-scope ms_to_right turnApply applySlides ms_grab" ng-class="['ms_to_right', 'turnApply', 'applySlides', data.settings.customClass]" data-ng-init="initSlider()" ms-swipe="" data-motoslider="" style="height: 517.969px; max-height: 600px; opacity: 1;">

<div class="ms_image ng-scope" ng-if="isSlideBgType('image')" ms-slide-image="" ng-style="getStyles()" style="min-height: 100%; background-image: url("https://malipodrum.rs/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Kafana.jpg"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: cover;">

passes.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
passes.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

passes.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
passes.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

passes.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
passes.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

passes.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

passes.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
passes.help: Table header text should not be empty

passes.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
passes.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

nodes.html: <iframe width="912" height="500" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Nis,%20stevana%20nemanje%2014&t=&z=13&ie=UTF8&iwloc=&output=embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

passes.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
passes.help: Images must have alternate text

passes.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
passes.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

passes.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
passes.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark
Ensures landmarks are unique
passes.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
Ensures links have discernible text
passes.help: Links must have discernible text

passes.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
passes.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

passes.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
passes.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

nodes.html: • Početna
• Meni
• Roštilj Mali podrum
• Galerija
• Kontakt

passes.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
passes.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

passes.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
passes.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

passes.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
passes.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

passes.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
passes.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

passes.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
passes.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

<div data-scope="" ms-slider="" id="2" class="ms_wrapper ng-scope ms_to_right turnApply applySlides ms_grab" ng-class="['ms_to_right', 'turnApply', 'applySlides', data.settings.customClass]" data-ng-init="initSlider()" ms-swipe="" data-motoslider="" style="height: 517.969px; max-height: 600px; opacity: 1;">

<div ms-slide-repeater="" ng-repeat="slide in data.slides track by $index" ng-show="isCurrentIndex($index)" data-current-index="0" class="ms_slide ms_repeater ms_optimize ng-scope ms_current_slide ms_show mpsl-animated ms_active" id="" ng-class="[isCurrentIndexFirst($index) && 'ms_current_slide ms_show', isCurrentIndexFirst($index) && data.defaults.animatedClass, slide.general.classes]">
<div class="ms_slide_wrapper" ms-slide="" enter-animation="msSlideFade" leave-animation="msSlideFade" duration="2000" easing="easeOutCirc">

<div class="ms_image ng-scope" ng-if="isSlideBgType('image')" ms-slide-image="" ng-style="getStyles()" style="min-height: 100%; background-image: url("https://malipodrum.rs/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Kafana.jpg"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: cover;">

<div ms-slide-repeater="" ng-repeat="slide in data.slides track by $index" ng-show="isCurrentIndex($index)" data-current-index="1" class="ms_slide ms_repeater ms_optimize ng-scope ng-hide false" id="" ng-class="[isCurrentIndexFirst($index) && 'ms_current_slide ms_show', isCurrentIndexFirst($index) && data.defaults.animatedClass, slide.general.classes]">
<div class="ms_slide_wrapper" ms-slide="" enter-animation="msSlideFade" leave-animation="msSlideFade" duration="2000" easing="easeOutCirc">

<div class="ms_image ng-scope" ng-if="isSlideBgType('image')" ms-slide-image="" ng-style="getStyles()" style="min-height: 100%; background-image: url("https://malipodrum.rs/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Kafana1.jpg"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 0% 50%; background-size: cover;">
Od danas ćete moći da uživate u dobro poznatom ukusu roštilja i na novoj lokaciji.

<iframe width="912" height="500" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Nis,%20stevana%20nemanje%2014&t=&z=13&ie=UTF8&iwloc=&output=embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe>

passes.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
passes.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

passes.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
passes.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

passes.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
passes.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

passes.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
passes.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

violations.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

violations.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

violations.help: Frames must have an accessible name

  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
